## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Refactor (code improvement without changing behavior)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Chore (dependencies, CI/CD, tooling)

## Security Checklist

> **Required for all PRs** - Check each item before requesting review

- [ ] No hardcoded secrets, API keys, or credentials
- [ ] No `console.log()` statements in production code
- [ ] Input validation added where needed
- [ ] No sensitive data in error messages or logs
- [ ] Environment variables used for all secrets (`import.meta.env.VITE_*`)
- [ ] No cross-feature imports (follows module boundaries)

## Testing

- [ ] Linter passes (`bun run lint`)
- [ ] Unit tests pass (`bun test:run`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`bun run build`)
- [ ] Tested manually in browser
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality (if applicable)
